nodes.bodyText: I don't think this should be static. set tearDown = false at the start of the method, and leave it as an instance variable.
Yeah, right, no reason for static here. I don't know what I was expecting to do here wit hit

Makes far more sens no. Thanks. Tests are indeed ignored instead of failing.
That'll still make a lot of noise, given that all tests are ignored; on the other hand that's also most efficient because it ensures test are not run twice with the same scheduler

set tearDown = false in this block, not in the variable init
setUp is run more than once, and we want the initial state to be false
